title: League of Legends Wont Open [MAC]
body: Been trying to play this new update (Christmas) and every time I open league, the logo shows for 2 seconds then disappears. Anyone have any solution to this? Been spending hours trying to figure it out.

replies.body:
Typically that means something on your OS is blocking the program from opening. Check out 
[**these steps on how you can get your mac admin settings** adjusted!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9)
I literally have the same exact issue and when i tried to reinstall the game it just gets stuck while downloading it and it sucks..
Before anyone asks, yes, I've reinstalled League and restarted my computer multiple times.
